subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Jiri Tlusty scored his first two goals of the season, Jordan Staal and Jeff Skinner also scored, and Cam Ward made 22 saves as the Hurricanes held on for a 4-3 win over the Islanders.
snippet: Jiri Tlusty scored his first two goals of the season, Jordan Staal and Jeff Skinner also scored, and Cam Ward made 22 saves as the Hurricanes held on for a 4-3 win over the Islanders.
